name: STAR CITIZEN Science Podcast! - Asking the Experts!
blurb: Science podcast for the Star Citizen community that connects fans to Real! Live! Earth and Space Exploration Scientists/Engineers!

name: The Big Interview with Graham Hunter
blurb:
Production of the podcast for the next year - more episodes, the best guests. We can't do it without you! 
Hit play on the video now!

name: The Black Tapes Podcast
blurb: The Black Tapes Podcast is a serialized docudrama about one journalist's search for truth and her enigmatic subject's mysterious past.

name: Bandwagon: Season 1
blurb: A podcast about being a part of something bigger than yourself. Each season features stories about a different type of bandwagon.

name: CREATEcast w/ Chase K
blurb: CREATEcast is the podcast about making good. Help me get started so you can hear from incredible individuals who capture creativity!

name: Candy Cigarettes Podcast
blurb: Candy Cigarettes is a podcast for anyone who's ever thought, "Gah, growing up %&*# sucks!" Oh & I'm sure Brandi will talk about bacon.

name: Life with Lisa Williams
blurb: WE HIT 100%!!! THANK YOU!!! Anything that comes in today over 100% will help buy a studio phone system ($2000) or go towards promotion.

name: Tote Bag Productions: Talking Machines
blurb: Talking Machines is a podcast about the reality of machine learning research. Help us make a second season!

name: The Randi Rhodes Radio Show - Streaming Live Across America
blurb: Randi Rhodes is ready, willing and able to create a listener-supported live streaming progressive talk show.

name: The World According to Sound: a 90-second podcast
blurb: Help us gather the world's sounds and bring them to public radio. We're making public airwaves a little weirder and more full of sound.

name: Welcome to Macintosh: Season 3
blurb: A highly-produced storytelling podcast about Apple and the community around it. 10 brand new episodes, coming Summer 2017.

name: Humanist Experience Radio
blurb: The Humanist Experience is a unique podcast where we educate our emotions and expand our world by living radical experiences.

name: Up and Vanished Podcast Season 2
blurb: Up and Vanished is an investigative true crime podcast. With your help, we'd like to produce a second season on a brand new case.

name: Kenophania: How A Song Is Created (Interactive Experience)
blurb: A new music experience: be a part of writing a song, follow its story, and watch it develop daily (Kickstarter Commissions)

name: Scientist Podcast
blurb: A podcast about people who do science

name: Fifty Feminist States
blurb: Fifty Feminist States is a multimedia storytelling project featuring feminist activists from all fifty US states.

name: Flatrock: A Cold Case Podcast
blurb: Answering the questions behind the murder of Kathy Jones

name: The View From Somewhere Podcast: Let's get to $16K!
blurb: A podcast about journalism with a purpose. We'll tell stories of journalists who have stood up for justice and resisted "objectivity."

name: Listen Up! Youth Radio Leadership Pilot Project
blurb: Developing the Twin Cities-based youth hosted radio program to support technical training, youth forums and leadership development.

name: The Encyclopedia Botanica Podcast
blurb: Encyclopedia Botanica is a listener-supported podcast about growing crops at home.

name: The Audio Adventurebook of Big Dan Frater Volume 2
blurb: Volume 2 of the Big Dan Frater audio book CD series written by Larry Blamire and starring Brian Howe, Alison Martin and Dan Conroy.

name: Soapboxers: A Fly-on-the-Wall Podcast about Speech & Debate
blurb: Conversations, interpretations, and in depth looks into the world of speech and debate tournaments and the ideas that drive them.

name: Memphis Weirdos
blurb: Memphis Weirdos is a popular shortwave radio show. It airs every week for thirty minutes. I want to expand to an hour.

name: Podcast Historias de Tránsito
blurb: Podcast que cuenta los resultados de un proyecto de investigación sobre la migración de adolescentes y jóvenes no acompañados en México
